cloud-connector-message-source.description: Box Cloud Connector for API V2.
cloud-connector-message-source.caption: Box (Streaming)

cloud-connector-message-source.description:
Message source that subscribes to the events long polling server and will trigger a new message each time an event is generated.
Such message will have an instance of @{link org.mule.modules.box.model.PollingEvent as payload and an inbound property called 'boxAccessTokenId' that will carry the accessTokenId of the user that owns the event.
This source will not provide the events that are generated, it's just a notification that there're new events available. You'll need to use the get-events processor to actually get them. Managing the stream position while doing so is up to you.
cloud-connector-message-source.caption: Listen Events
